come.name: come
come.description: Moves the bot to a player's position.

identify.name: identify
identify.description: Show your user ID, username, and permissions.

position.name: position
position.description: Display someone's position in the room.

summon.name: summon
summon.description: Teleport a player to your position.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.description: Teleport a player to a specific position.

follow.name: follow
follow.description: Make the bot follow a player.

spawn.name: spawn
spawn.description: Set the bot's current position as the spawn point.

move.name: move
move.description: Move the bot to a named location.

locations.name: locations
locations.description: Display, add or remove saved locations.

grant.name: grant
grant.description: Grant or revoke a role or permission to a user. Usage: !grant role|permission @username name / !revoke role|permission @username name

revoke.name: revoke
revoke.description: Revoke (remove) a role or permission from a user. Usage: !revoke role|permission @username name

heart.name: heart
heart.description: Send a heart reaction to a user or all users in the room. Usage: !heart @user or !heart all

react.name: react
react.description: Send a reaction to a user or all users in the room. Usage: !react <reaction> @user or !react <reaction> all. Supported reactions: clap, heart, thumbs, wave, wink.

clap.name: clap
clap.description: Send a clap reaction to one or more users, or all users in the room. Usage: !clap @user1 @user2 ... | !clap all

thumbs.name: thumbs
thumbs.description: Send a thumbs reaction to one or more users, or all users in the room. Usage: !thumbs @user1 @user2 ... | !thumbs all

wave.name: wave
wave.description: Send a wave reaction to one or more users, or all users in the room. Usage: !wave @user1 @user2 ... | !wave all

wink.name: wink
wink.description: Send a wink reaction to one or more users, or all users in the room. Usage: !wink @user1 @user2 ... | !wink all

emote.name: emote
emote.description: Play, list, save, update, remove, move, or show details for emotes. Usage: !emote <name|id|number> [loop] [interval] [all|@user ...] | !emote list | !emote save ... | !emote update ... | !emote remove ... | !emote details ... | !emote move ...
